*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas F. McKinney to James F. Perry, July 27, 1834. Forwarding letter from Austin.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Velasco */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-27-1834">July 27 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr. J. F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*D Sir a *person_mentioned*gentleman */person_mentioned*had special charge as to the delivery of a package brot *location_mentioned*on board the Empress*/location_mentioned* finding I lived at this place and the Schr would not wait he was compelled to leave them with one of my *person_mentioned*workmen */person_mentioned*on the oposite side of the river. I immediately left for the *location_mentioned*settlements */location_mentioned*above and thus missed receiving the package which contained the letter directed to you by*person_mentioned* Col A */person_mentioned*as I infer from the hand writing—I have been exceedingly ill at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr Bell*/person_mentioned*'s*/location_mentioned* for several days and was only able *date_mentioned n="07-26-1834">yesterday morning*/date_mentioned* to be moved after traveling all night by water arrived at *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*this morning and hasten to forward the letter if it contains any knews as to the *person_mentioned*Col */person_mentioned*do let us hear a brief sketch of it*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*William Jack*/person_mentioned* writes me from *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* that *person_mentioned*Genl Almonte */person_mentioned*is in that place he finds him intelligent, pleasant, frank and candid he assures him that if *person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned* is not already released that he will unequivocaly be in a very short time says we are a badly slandered people and were reported as being in a state of open rebellion and that he was sent in order to ascertain and report the facts and has and will take such measures as to set all on a fair footing*/p*
*p*I am truly yours much exhausted with fatigue and must lie down Only having just arrived at home*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*T. F. McKinney */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
